title: In expression builder, selecting the dataset shows the old column names instead of the aliases.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The old column names will be displayed instead of the aliases that were set.
